reviewText: As I said before, this family of tutorial videos from Video Aided Instruction are simply excellent. Anyone can assure learning from these tutor's methods. Highly recommended.

I tutor and teach math including remedial studies. These  Basic Math DVDs provide very good student practice  The instructor goes at a pace suitable to a good understanding of the subject.  A mastering or remastering of basic math, particularly with negative numbers, is essential before going on to coordinate systems and geometry, and this is nicely covered here.
